Package muscle.core

Interface Summary
DefaultProperties  
 

Class Summary
BBox describes local (dicrete) coordinate system of dataset and a viewport
for more functinality the javax.media.j3d.BoundingBox class may be more suitable
Boot handle booting/terminating of MUSCLE
ConduitDescription stores info necessary to setup a conduit
ConduitEntrance<T extends Serializable> this is the (remote) head of a conduit, an entrance sends data to the conduit agent
ConduitExit<T> this is the (remote) tail of a conduit, an exit receives data from the conduit agent
ConnectionScheme describes the p2p connections between kernels
ConnectionScheme.Pipeline  
CxADescription singleton which holds information about the current CxA
CxADescription.Key  
DataTemplate<T> describes data content and accompanies a DataWrapper
EntranceDependency information about any exit an entrance may depend on
EntranceDescription stores info necessary to setup an entrance
ExitDescription stores info necessary to setup an exit
JADE encapsulate booting of JADE and tearing down JADE
JNIConduitEntrance<R,C extends Serializable> entrance which can directly be called from native code
C for conduit type, R for raw jni type
JNIConduitExit<C,R> exit which can directly be called from native code
C for conduit type, R for raw jni type
MultiDataAgent JADE agent which filters incomming data messages and passes them to multiple message sinks
Plumber listens for kernel announcements and spawns conduits according to the connection scheme
Portal<T>  
PortalID portal identifier
Scale represents time and spatial scale according to SSM in SI units
 

Exception Summary
Plumber.DeadlockException
